private_welcome: Hello! This is your personal place for relaxation. 🌿
group_welcome: Hello, group! I'm here to bring you comfort and positivity. 🌟
start_message: I am Chillify 🌿 — your bot for relaxation. Choose what you'd like:
help_message:
Hello! I am Chillify 🌿, your bot for relaxation and good vibes. ✨

Available commands:
/start — start interacting with the bot.
/quotes — get inspiring quotes.
/memes — get memes for a good mood.
/relax — get relaxing messages to unwind.
/help — information about the bot and its features.
/lang — choose your language.
/about — learn more about me and my creator.

Message me and I'll help you relax! 🌱
about_message:
Chillify 🌿 is a bot that helps you relax and improve your mood by providing memes, quotes, and calming messages.

Developer: @li3ycuk

Join us and get your dose of positive energy wherever you are!
bot_blocked: Please unblock the bot to choose your language.
go_to_private_message: Please go to private messages to choose your language.
choose_language: Choose your preferred language for communication with Chillify 🌿.
lang_selected: - Your language has been successfully updated! 🎉
